name: Socrates emotional speech database
comments: 10 single words, 20 short sentences, 25 long sentences, 12 passages of fluent speech, one female speaker.
stimulus_type: Recordings of a professional actress reading semantically neutral words and sentences in different emotions

name: BELFAST naturalistic emotion database
comments: laboratory-based emotion inducing tasks; See also http://www.psych.qub.ac.uk/BINED/Default.aspx

name: LDC Emotional prosody speech-transcripts
emotions: Anxiety, boredom, cold anger, contempt, despair, disgust, elation, happy, Hot Anger, interest, panic, pride, sadness, shame, neutral
comments: Only a subpart available;  eight actors (five females, thre males), 44 utterances used by Liscombe et al. (2003), 2,433 utterances used by Yacoub et al. (2003)
stimulus_type: Professional actors reading short (4-syllables each) dates and numbers

name: Speech under simulated and actual stress
Berlin database of emotional speech
emotions: Anger, Boredom, Disgust, Fear, Joy, Sadness

name: Groningen corpus S0020ELRA(1996) (see http://www.elra.info/).
stimulus_type: Recordings of speakers reading short texts, sentences, numbers, monosyllabic words, long vowels and an extended word list

name: FAU Aibo emotion corpus
comments: Children interacting with Aibo robot; author passed away

name: eNTERFACE
emotions: Anger, Disgust, Fear, Happiness, Sad, Surprise
